verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
For Thou art great
and doest wondrous things.
Thou art God alone,
teach me Thy ways, O Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will walk in Thy truth,
unite my heart to fear Thy Name.
I will praise Thee,
O Lord my God, with all my heart,
And I will glorify Thy Name forevermore.
